item.title: Primeiro Post
item.description: const spec = { "title": "Mediana do volume percentual ao longo de meses e anos", "$schema": "https://vega.github.io/schema/vega-lite/v2.json", "data": { "url": "https://api.insa.gov.br/reservatorios/12172/monitoramento", "format": { "type": "json", "property": "volumes", "parse": { "DataInformacao": "utc:'%d/%m/%Y'" } } }, "width": 500, "height": 120, "mark": "rect", "encoding": { "x": { "timeUnit" : "year", "field": "DataInformacao", "type": "ordinal", "axis": {"format": "%Y", "title" : "Anos"} }, "y": { "timeUnit" : "month", "field": "DataInformacao", "
